title: The Holiday Stalking
description: "Part of the Ancient Blood series.It's Christmastime and vampire Vincent Dilorenzo can't take much more of the good will and cheer. When he's drafted into helping with a church charity drive, he thinks his problems can't get any worse. Then an old rival appears to resurrect painful memories of a past love. Little does Vincent know that an even truer love awaits him during his most dreaded holiday season.Review quotes from The Holiday Stalking by Kate HillGreat story. Vincent is just so cool, I really wish this was a full length novel featuring him. ~Flora Bell, Sensual Romance ReviewsVincent is a very enthralling, sexy and charismatic vampire with a sense of humor and kindness that many would find unbelievable. ~Tracey West, Sensual Romance ReviewsVincent is the regular bad boy type that you want to hate but just can't help loving. ~Lisa Lambrecht from In the Library Reviews "
author: Kate  Hill
